mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS WHERE CM_ORDERID = (SELECT CM_ORDERID FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS WHERE CM_ORDERDETAILSID = #{orderdetailid})
SELECT t1.CM_STATE AS CM_STATE FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDERS AS t1 ON t0.CM_ORDERID = t1.CM_ORDERID WHERE t0.CM_GOODSID = #{cmGoodsid} AND t0.CM_USERID = #{cmUserid};

SELECT t0.CM_CREATETIME, t0.CM_ORDERID, t0.CM_NUMBERSUN, t0.CM_MONEYSUN, t0.CM_STATE, t4.value AS CM_GOODSID2, t4.value2 AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t4.value3 AS CM_TITLE, t4.value4 AS CM_PRESENTPRICE, t4.CM_MONEY, t4.CM_NUMBER, t4.value5 AS CM_SELLERID2, t4.value6 AS CM_SELLERNAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t5 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t6 ON t5.CM_GOODSID = t6.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t7 ON t6.CM_SELLERID = t7.CM_SELLERID WHERE t5.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID ) AS value2 FROM TB_ORDERS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t2.CM_GOODSID AS value, t2.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS value2, t2.CM_TITLE AS value3, t2.CM_PRESENTPRICE AS value4, t1.CM_MONEY, t1.CM_NUMBER, t2.CM_SELLERID AS value5, t3.CM_SELLERNAME AS value6, t1.CM_ORDERID, t1.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t3.CM_SELLERID FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t2 ON t1.CM_GOODSID = t2.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t3 ON t2.CM_SELLERID = t3.CM_SELLERID ) AS t4 ON t4.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID WHERE t0.CM_USERID = #{cmUserID} ORDER BY t0.CM_ORDERID, t4.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t4.value, t4.CM_SELLERID, t0.CM_CREATETIME DESC

SELECT t0.CM_CREATETIME, t0.CM_ORDERID, t0.CM_NUMBERSUN, t0.CM_MONEYSUN, t0.CM_ORDERDETAILSIDS, t0.CM_STATE, t0.CM_USERID, t4.value AS CM_GOODSID2, t4.value2 AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t4.value3 AS CM_TITLE, t4.value4 AS CM_PRESENTPRICE, t4.CM_MONEY, t4.CM_NUMBER, t4.value5 AS CM_SELLERID2, t4.value6 AS CM_SELLERNAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t5 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t6 ON t5.CM_GOODSID = t6.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t7 ON t6.CM_SELLERID = t7.CM_SELLERID WHERE t5.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID ) AS value2 FROM TB_ORDERS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t2.CM_GOODSID AS value, t2.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS value2, t2.CM_TITLE AS value3, t2.CM_PRESENTPRICE AS value4, t1.CM_MONEY, t1.CM_NUMBER, t2.CM_SELLERID AS value5, t3.CM_SELLERNAME AS value6, t1.CM_ORDERID, t1.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t3.CM_SELLERID FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t2 ON t1.CM_GOODSID = t2.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t3 ON t2.CM_SELLERID = t3.CM_SELLERID ) AS t4 ON t4.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID WHERE (t0.CM_USERID = #{userId}) AND (t0.CM_STATE = 0) ORDER BY t0.CM_ORDERID, t4.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t4.value, t4.CM_SELLERID, t0.CM_CREATETIME DESC

SELECT t0.CM_CREATETIME, t0.CM_ORDERID, t0.CM_NUMBERSUN, t0.CM_MONEYSUN, t0.CM_ORDERDETAILSIDS, t0.CM_STATE, t0.CM_USERID, t4.value AS CM_GOODSID2, t4.value2 AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t4.value3 AS CM_TITLE, t4.value4 AS CM_PRESENTPRICE, t4.CM_MONEY, t4.CM_NUMBER, t4.value5 AS CM_SELLERID2, t4.value6 AS CM_SELLERNAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t5 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t6 ON t5.CM_GOODSID = t6.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t7 ON t6.CM_SELLERID = t7.CM_SELLERID WHERE t5.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID ) AS value2 FROM TB_ORDERS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t2.CM_GOODSID AS value, t2.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS value2, t2.CM_TITLE AS value3, t2.CM_PRESENTPRICE AS value4, t1.CM_MONEY, t1.CM_NUMBER, t2.CM_SELLERID AS value5, t3.CM_SELLERNAME AS value6, t1.CM_ORDERID, t1.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t3.CM_SELLERID FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t2 ON t1.CM_GOODSID = t2.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t3 ON t2.CM_SELLERID = t3.CM_SELLERID ) AS t4 ON t4.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID WHERE (t0.CM_USERID = #{userId}) AND (t0.CM_STATE = 2 OR t0.CM_STATE = 3) ORDER BY t0.CM_ORDERID, t4.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t4.value, t4.CM_SELLERID, t0.CM_CREATETIME DESC

SELECT t0.CM_CREATETIME, t0.CM_ORDERID, t0.CM_NUMBERSUN, t0.CM_MONEYSUN, t0.CM_ORDERDETAILSIDS, t0.CM_STATE, t0.CM_USERID, t0.CM_USESCORE, t1.CM_SHOPNAME AS CM_NICKNAME, t1.CM_PHONE AS CM_PHONE, t1.CM_SHOPEADDRESS AS CM_SHOPEADDRESS, t5.value AS CM_GOODSID2, t5.value2 AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t5.value3 AS CM_TITLE, t5.value4 AS CM_PRESENTPRICE, t5.CM_MONEY, t5.CM_NUMBER, t5.CM_SPECNUMDETAILS, t5.value5 AS CM_SELLERID2, t5.value6 AS CM_SELLERNAME, t5.CM_LOGISTICSID, t5.CM_LOGISTICSINFO, t5.CM_LOGISTICSNUM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t6 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t7 ON t6.CM_GOODSID = t7.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t8 ON t7.CM_SELLERID = t8.CM_SELLERID WHERE t6.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID ) AS value2 FROM TB_ORDERS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USERS AS t1 ON t0.CM_USERID = t1.CM_USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t3.CM_GOODSID AS value, t3.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS value2, t3.CM_TITLE AS value3, t3.CM_PRESENTPRICE AS value4, t2.CM_MONEY, t2.CM_NUMBER, t2.CM_SPECNUMDETAILS, t3.CM_SELLERID AS value5, t4.CM_SELLERNAME AS value6, t2.CM_LOGISTICSID, t2.CM_LOGISTICSINFO, t2.CM_LOGISTICSNUM, t2.CM_ORDERID, t2.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t4.CM_SELLERID FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t2 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t3 ON t2.CM_GOODSID = t3.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t4 ON t3.CM_SELLERID = t4.CM_SELLERID ) AS t5 ON t5.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID WHERE t0.CM_ORDERID = #{orderid} ORDER BY t0.CM_ORDERID, t1.CM_USERID, t5.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t5.value, t5.CM_SELLERID

SELECT t0.CM_STATE AS CM_ORDER_STATE, t0.CM_CREATETIME, t0.CM_MONEYSUN, t0.CM_NUMBERSUN, t0.CM_ORDERID, t4.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t4.CM_MONEY, t4.CM_NUMBER, t4.CM_SERVICESTATE AS CM_SERVICE_STATE, t4.CM_GOODSID, t4.value AS CM_TITLE, t4.value2 AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t4.value3 AS CM_PRESENTPRICE, t4.value4 AS CM_SELLERID2, t4.value5 AS CM_SELLERNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t5 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t6 ON t5.CM_GOODSID = t6.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t7 ON t6.CM_SELLERID = t7.CM_SELLERID WHERE (t5.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID) AND (t5.CM_SERVICESTATE = 0) ) AS value FROM TB_ORDERS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t1.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t1.CM_MONEY, t1.CM_NUMBER, t1.CM_SERVICESTATE, t1.CM_GOODSID, t2.CM_TITLE AS value, t2.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS value2, t2.CM_PRESENTPRICE AS value3, t2.CM_SELLERID AS value4, t3.CM_SELLERNAME AS value5, t1.CM_ORDERID, t2.CM_GOODSID AS CM_GOODSID2, t3.CM_SELLERID FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t2 ON t1.CM_GOODSID = t2.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t3 ON t2.CM_SELLERID = t3.CM_SELLERID ) AS t4 ON (t4.CM_ORDERID = t0.CM_ORDERID) AND (t4.CM_SERVICESTATE = 0) WHERE (t0.CM_USERID = #{cmUserid}) AND ((t0.CM_STATE = 3) OR (t0.CM_STATE = 4) ) ORDER BY t0.CM_CREATETIME, t0.CM_ORDERID, t4.CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t4.CM_GOODSID2, t4.CM_SELLERID

SELECT t1.CM_ORDERID AS CM_ORDERID, t0.CM_AFTERSERVICEID, t2.CM_GOODSID AS CM_GOODSID, t1.CM_ORDERDETAILSID AS CM_ORDERDETAILSID, t0.CM_STATE, t0.CM_CREATETIME, t2.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t2.CM_TITLE AS CM_TITLE, t2.CM_SELLERID AS CM_SELLERID, t3.CM_SELLERNAME AS CM_SELLERNAME, t1.CM_LOGISTICSNUM AS CM_LOGISTICSNUM, t1.CM_LOGISTICSINFO AS CM_LOGISTICSINFO FROM TB_AFTERSERVICES AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORDERDETAILS AS t1 ON t0.CM_ORDERDETAILSID = t1.CM_ORDERDETAILSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t2 ON t1.CM_GOODSID = t2.CM_GOODSID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SELLERS AS t3 ON t2.CM_SELLERID = t3.CM_SELLERID WHERE t0.CM_USERID = #{cmUserid} ORDER BY t0.CM_CREATETIME

SELECT t1.CM_BRANDID AS CM_BRANDID, t1.CM_FIGURESPATH AS CM_FIGURESPATH, t0.CM_GOODSID, t1.CM_MAINFIGUREPATH AS CM_MAINFIGUREPATH, t1.CM_PRESENTPRICE AS CM_PRESENTPRICE, t1.CM_ORIGINALPRICE AS CM_ORIGINALPRICE, t1.CM_SALES AS CM_SALES, t1.CM_TITLE AS CM_TITLE, t0.CM_JOINTIME, t0.CM_COLLECTIONID FROM TB_COLLECTIONS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GOODS AS t1 ON t0.CM_GOODSID = t1.CM_GOODSID WHERE t0.CM_USERID = #{cmUserid} ORDER BY t0.CM_JOINTIME

SELECT a.CM_SELLERSTATE AS CM_ORDER_STATE, b.CM_STATE AS CM_DETAILS_STATE, a.CM_ORDERDETAILSID AS CM_ORDERDETAILSID, a.CM_SELLERID AS CM_SELLERID, a.CM_SERVICESTATE AS CM_SERVICESTATE FROM TB_ORDERDETAILS a LEFT JOIN TB_ORDERS b ON a.CM_ORDERID = b.CM_ORDERID WHERE a.CM_ORDERDETAILSID = #{orderdetailsid};

SELECT t0.CM_USERID, t0.CM_SHOPLON, t0.CM_SHOPLAT, t0.CM_BALANCE, t0.CM_INTEGRAL, t1.CM_USERID AS CM_USERID2, ( SELECT count(*) FROM TB_USERS AS t2 WHERE (t2.CM_USERID <> t0.CM_USERID) AND (t2.CM_SHOPLON > (t0.CM_SHOPLON - 0.01)) AND (t2.CM_SHOPLON < (t0.CM_SHOPLON + 0.01)) AND (t2.CM_SHOPLAT > (t0.CM_SHOPLAT - 0.01)) AND (t2.CM_SHOPLAT < (t0.CM_SHOPLAT + 0.01)) ) AS VALUE FROM TB_USERS AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USERS AS t1 ON (t1.CM_USERID <> t0.CM_USERID) AND (t1.CM_SHOPLON > (t0.CM_SHOPLON - 0.01)) AND (t1.CM_SHOPLON < (t0.CM_SHOPLON + 0.01)) AND (t1.CM_SHOPLAT > (t0.CM_SHOPLAT - 0.01)) AND (t1.CM_SHOPLAT < (t0.CM_SHOPLAT + 0.01)) WHERE t0.CM_USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY t0.CM_USERID, t1.CM_USERID
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ADDRESSES SET CM_ISFIRST = '0' WHERE CM_ISFIRST = '1'
